message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient's symptoms and past medical history suggest trigeminal neuralgia. Carbamazepine is the medication of choice in treating this condition. Alprazolam is not indicated for the treatment of trigeminal neuralgia. High flow oxygen is not indicated for this condition. Regular outpatient follow-up may not address the patient's current symptoms.

Regular outpatient follow-up may not be appropriate given the severity of the patient’s symptoms.
